siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: imbue allows influencers to create & monetize beautiful fitness experiences while allowing you unprecedented access into the fitness routines of the influencers you know & love.
blogPost.body: imbue allows influencers to create & monetize beautiful fitness experiences while allowing you unprecedented access into the fitness routines of the influencers you know & love.
blogPost.title: imbue - Beautiful fitness experiences with influencers.
blogPost.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: Inbue让有影响力的人创造美丽的健身体验并将其货币化，同时让你前所未有地接触到你认识的有影响力的人&你所爱的人的健身习惯。
localize.tagline: 与有影响力的人一起享受美丽的健身体验。

localize.description: Inbue讓有影響力的人創造美麗的健身體驗並將其貨幣化，同時讓你前所未有地接觸到你認識的有影響力的人&你所愛的人的健身習慣。
localize.tagline: 與有影響力的人一起享受美麗的健身體驗。

previous.excerpt: Budg is a tool to easily track your subscriptions (aka recurring expenses).
previous.title: Budg - The tool you need to track your subscriptions

localize.description: Budg是一款可以轻松跟踪您的订阅(也就是经常性费用)的工具。
localize.tagline: 跟踪您的订阅所需的工具

localize.description: Budg是一款可以輕鬆跟蹤您的訂閱(也就是經常性費用)的工具。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤您的訂閱所需的工具

next.excerpt: DoYouNotes helps students memorize their notes faster. How? 1. upload a PDF file 2. mark the sections to study 3. review the sections (recall/show/hide content, spaced repetition, order by urgency/randomly, self-evaluate) 4. check your progress
next.title: DoYouNotes - Memorize your notes faster

localize.description: DoYouNotes帮助学生更快地记忆笔记。如何上传？1.上传PDF文件2.标记要学习的部分3.复习各部分(回忆/显示/隐藏内容、间隔重复、按紧急程度/随机排序、自我评估)4.检查您的进度
DoYouNotes幫助學生更快地記憶筆記。如何上傳？1.上傳PDF文件2.標記要學習的部分3.複習各部分(回憶/顯示/隱藏內容、間隔重複、按緊急程度/隨機排序、自我評估)4.檢查您的進度
